name: Love & Fighting
description:
Nostalgic for ye olden times of driving around locals in need of a ride? Look no further! Love & Fighting has got you covered! 

Roam the world as a transforming Mech and taxi hybrid. Your goal is to collect LOVE to defeat the evils that lurk within the surrounding waters.

Though we've done our best to get this game as close to finish as possible for the Mech II GameJam , we'll still be working on this project within the coming weeks to add in the features we really want to include (Kaiju battle!).

Please enjoy our very silly game!
